pagination.PAGE_MANDATORY: It's mandatory to specify the page number of the pagination
pagination.SIZE_MANDATORY: It's mandatory to specify the page size of the pagination
pagination.PAGE_FORMAT: The page value from the pagination must be a number
pagination.SIZE_FORMAT: The size value from the pagination must be a number
pagination.SORT_ORDER_FORMAT: The sort order of the pagination must be 'asc' or 'desc'

validation.USERNAME: The username is a mandatory text value
validation.PASSWORD: The password is a mandatory text value

auth.AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED: It is required to be authenticated
auth.NOT_ENOUGH_PERMISSIONS: You do not have enough permissions
auth.INVALID_SIGNATURE: Provided authentication signature it is invalid
auth.TOKEN_NOT_PROVIDED: It is mandatory to provide the authentication token

validation.NAME: Name is a mandatory text value
validation.EMAIL: E-mail is a mandatory text field with a valid e-mail format
validation.USERNAME: Username is a mandatory text value
validation.PASSWORD: Password is a mandatory text value
validation.ROLES: Roles is a mandatory text list
validation.ROLE: Every role must be a valid role value
validation.LANGUAGE: Language is a mandatory text value between spanish (es) or english (en)
validation.ADDRESS: Address is a mandatory text field
validation.CITY: City is a mandatory text field
validation.COUNTRY: Country is a mandatory text field
validation.ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED: Is mandatory to specify if the account has not expired
validation.ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED: Is mandatory to specify if the account has not been locked
validation.CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED: Is mandatory to specify if the credentials have not expired
validation.ENABLED: Is mandatory to specify if the user is enabled
validation.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Is mandatory to specify if the users's password has changed

users.EMAIL_EXISTS: E-mail is in use by another user
users.USERNAME_EXISTS: Username is in use by another user
users.PASSWORD_STRENGTH: Password must have a length between 8 and 16 characters with at least one letter
users.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: The user's account has been locked and cannot be used
users.ACCOUNT_EXPIRED: The user's account has expired and cannot be used
users.USER_DISABLED: The user's account has been disabled and cannot be used
users.CREDENTIALS_EXPIRED: The user's credentials have expired and it is not possible to log in
